title: Justin Bieber and wife Hailey share new scantily clad snaps for new Calvin Klein ad
text:
Just days after their first Calvin Klein ad debuted, Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber shared new snaps from their ad campaign.

The 25 year old singer and his 22 year old model wife took to their Instagram accounts to share new snaps with the couple wearing CK underwear.

The Bieber's are among several new models for Calvin Klein's 50th Anniversary campaign, including A$AP Rocky, Troye Sivan and Liu Wen.

CK models: @calvinklein @haileybieber #ck50 #mycalvins

Bieber shared a photo of himself, wearing only CK boxer briefs, while his wife was wearing a CK sports bra and underwear.

Bieber didn't state anything in the caption, but he did tag @calvinklein @haileybieber with the #ck50 and #mycalvins hashtags.

Hailey shared a snap of her wearing the same CK sports bra and underwear, while straddling her shirtless husband wearing pajama pants.

CK ad: Bieber shared a photo of himself, wearing only CK boxer briefs, while his wife was wearing a CK sports bra and underwear

'@calvinklein #cK50 campaign with my love :) #mycalvins,' Hailey Bieber said of the snap, where her husband had his hands on her behind.

She shared another photo of just herself, modeling a black CK sports bra and underwear.

'New @calvinklein #ck50 campaign shot by #glenlutchford :) in #mycalvins,' Hailey said of the new shot.

Hailey model: She shared another photo of just herself, modeling a black CK sports bra and underwear

The CK ad campaign was unveiled just days after the couple held their official wedding ceremony in South Carolina, more than a year after their surprise courthouse ceremony in New York City.

The couple had first started dating for just a few months between December 2015 and January 2016, while Bieber was on a break from his on and off girlfriend Selena Gomez.

When Bieber and Gomez split for good in March 2018, he reconciled with Hailey (nee Baldwin) in May 2018, and they were engaged by early July.

Marriage: The couple had obtained a marriage license in September, fueling rumors that they had a civil marriage

The couple had obtained a marriage license in September, fueling rumors that they had a civil marriage.

The singer confirmed in November 2018 that he and Hailey were in fact married, through their courthouse ceremony.

Bieber hasn't released an album since 2015's Purpose, but he confirmed on Instagram Live on Tuesday that he is releasing a new album by the end of 2019.
description: Just days after their first Calvin Klein ad debuted, Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber shared new snaps from their ad campaign.
